In fact, one of the only things that makes it readable for me is knowing that I know how the story ends.  McConnell's abusive childhood gives way to a reckless lifestyle as he gets older.  Substance abuse and crime became a normal lifestyle which ultimately lead to jail time.  Reading the journey from that lifestyle to one that leads to mission work in Brazil and church planting among Scotland's poor points to what a mighty Savior we have.  No darkness is too deep, no pain to much for Him to not be able to rescue and redeem His children.  For this reason I highly recommend reading this book.  You will no doubt exalt the grace of God in Christ as you journey through the book.I received a copy of this book from Christian Focus in exchange for an honest review.

Jesus Continued...Why the Spirit Inside You is Better Than Jesus Beside You is an eye-catching new title that seeks to bring clarity to how the Spirit works in the Christian's life.  Often Christians fall into one of two lines of thinking on how the Spirit works: 1) If the Spirit is at work there will be outward signs and wonders, lots of flash and show and production that accompanies His work.  This hyper-charismatic thinking has highjacked many churches in the sense that the written Word of God can take a backseat to outward experiences of the individual.  2) Out of fear of falling over the edge into the first group, sometimes Christians can flat out ignore the Holy Spirit, as if He isn't even a living, active member of the Trinity.  As believers, we should desire to be Biblically faithful in our thinking about the Spirit and not a product of one of the above environments.If the reader gets nothing else out of this book Greear certainly will help them to see that the Spirit can't be separated from the Bible or Christ. Greear clearly states, "we cannot know the Spirit apart from the revealed Word. That Word, Jesus, said, was all about him (John 5:39). The Spirit points to Jesus' words and works, not his own (John 16:14). In fact, there is a certain irony in how the Spirit operates; whenever he is really present, you are not thinking about him, you're thinking about Jesus. The Spirit's work is to direct you to notice something else......This means that when someone claims to be filled with the Spirit and yet spends most of his time talking about his own experiences with the Spirit, you have reason to doubt whether he really is filled with the Spirit. When the Holy Spirit speaks through someone, you tend to forget about the person speaking. You don't even really think about the Holy Spirit. You find yourself thinking about Jesus."  The Bible is the filter for all activity and thought we may claim is to be coming from the Spirit.  Greear continues, "we know that the Spirit leads and guides and acts in line with the Scriptures that God has already inspired. In his written Word, the Spirit of God is always speaking and never silent. Yet he also sometimes 'breaks in' to our experience in unexpected ways to give us specific guidance, strength, or insight at particular times. The precise nature of the 'breaking in' we can never script, demand, predict, or even anticipate. It is like the wind. The most that we can say is that it will never contradict, violate, or diminish the Word he already has given to us. This is the joyful, mysterious journey of the Christian life." With the proper understanding that the Spirit focuses on Christ and never contradicts Scripture we will be better equipped to understand these "break ins."  So, if walking down the street I get the urge to do something "spirit led" that draws much attention to myself and makes little of Christ I can be sure that that is not from the Spirit. However, if walking down the street I get the urging to talk to someone I just passed about Christ, I can weigh this "urging" against Scripture and recognize that it is in line with the Word and could very well be an urging from the Spirit.  The key is that Scripture sets the boundaries for us, not our emotions and experiences. So, "when is comes to the voice of God, the Scriptures are in a class all by themselves. God is always speaking clearly and reliably there. Want to hear the Spirit? Open you Bible."  This seems simple and straightforward, but many will move past the Bible in search for an experience.In the second part of the book Greear examines how Christians can experience the Holy Spirit: In the Gospel, In the Word of God, In Our Giftings, In the Church, In Our Spirit, and In Our Circumstances.  Each of these sections is helpful and practical.  Greear takes a non-cessationist perspective in regards to gifts, but I think that he does it in a very conservative way if I can say it like that.  He admits he is always cautious and questioning to make sure whatever the experience is does indeed line up with Scripture, but he doesn't dismiss God breaking in in extraordinary ways.Overall I found this book to be a helpful read.  It would be highly beneficial to many today who are confused about how the Holy Spirit works in the life of a believer.I received a copy of this book from Zondervan in exchange for an honest review.

The relationship between evangelism and social action is a relationship that has caused much conversation and thought in the recent years.  A heightened awareness of social needs has prompted many Christians to sacrifice much for the physical needs of people. Sadly, sometimes this awareness has overshadowed the proclamation of the gospel as the main thing the church should be doing.  Some react to this line of thinking by only proclaiming the gospel and not focusing the time and energy of the church on social needs. Thankfully in Salt, Light and Cities on Hills Melvin Tinker examines these extremes and shows a "middle way" that cares for the physical needs of people without forgetting that the proclamation of the gospel is our great call.Tinker begins by looking back over history to trace these thoughts out.  He does a nice job succinctly presenting how differing views have been shaped and molded over time by various people.  He really makes a point to show that the thought of social transformation as having equal footing with evangelism is really a novel idea.  On the reformers he states, "One would be hard-pressed to find any evidence that they would have shared the view that it was one of its 'principal aims.' Where in the New Testament is this ever put forward as being the case if evangelism is taken as proclaiming the evangel? The evangel as presented by the apostle Paul in his letter to the Romans displays no indication of social transformation being integral to the message; rather, it is a spiritual transformation which is its focus. As people's relationship with God is changed, social change also takes place, which is primarily, although not exclusively, within the realm of the redeemed community - the church" This is a key quote.  With spiritual change comes social change.  A redeemed community (the Church) should desire to meet the physical needs of needy people they come in contact with, but this can't be seen as the main goal. Rather, social action is the natural outflow of a spiritual transformation.Tinker's examination of Tim Keller placing evangelism and social concern has equal task for the church is also well done. He shows the flaw in Keller's line of thinking by stating that, "the most obvious argument for the primacy of evangelism is not considered, which is in terms of what is ultimately at stake, namely, peoples eternal destiny. When this is placed into the equation, evangelism's primacy becomes self-evident. The test which can be applied is a simple theoretical one: given no alternative but a straightforward choice between sharing the Gospel with someone who is dying and alleviating their physical condition which should we do? The answer must be to share the Gospel if we take eternal reality seriously." Evangelism should be the churches primary task because it seeks to alleviate eternal suffering, not just temporal.This does not mean that the church ignores the physical needs of people.  This is where Tinker helpfully shows balance.  He states, "no doubt many ministries of mercy will be carried out on an individual level by members of a congregation. But this should not make the church leadership complacent and leaving matters there. The Evangelical churches which emphasize evangelism in line with it's biblical priority would not be content to leave witness to ad hoc day-to-day witness of its members but tend to invest vast amounts of time, money, energy and personnel in organized corporate evangelism, so why should social action be treated any differently?" The church should corporately and actively pursue ways to meet physical needs in their community. The key is understanding the relationship between evangelism and social action, and this is where Melvin Tinker has provided a most useful tool for the church.I received a copy of this book from Evangelical Press in exchange for an honest review.

About a month ago I received a new family devotional and Sunday School curriculum by Marty Machowski titled Prepare Him Room: Celebrating the Birth of Jesus (my review can be found here).  I found this to be an excellent tool and my wife used it in her 1-3 grade class for Advent. Sovereign Grace Music also released an album titled Prepare Him Room: Celebrating the Birth of Jesus in Song which is referenced for the singing times in each devotion.  Because of time constraints the album didn't make it to the Sunday School class, but that doesn't mean that it didn't bless our home.  For the past couple of weeks this album has been playing non-stop as I drive around for work all day.  About a week ago, after much urging from me and my non-stop talk about it, my wife finally gave it a listen, and now whenever there is music playing in our home it is this album.  I am not speaking in exaggerated language at all, we simply cannot get enough of this album.So why such love for the album?  For me it is the blend of classical Christmas songs like: Come All Ye Faithful, What Child Is This, Hark! The Herald Angels Sing performed really well in combination with many new favorites like: He Who Is Mighty, Prepare Him Room, God Made Low and more.  Most of these new songs get replayed multiple times as I make my way through the album.  The lyrical content is so rich and provides a wonderful opportunity to praise God in song.  A new form of O Holy Night titled O Holy Night (Hear the Gospel Story) provides new words that incorporate Christ's sacrifice and our need to receive Him with the traditional first verse.  Overall, this album has been and will continue to be an incredible blessing for my family and I cannot recommend it highly enough.  Go buy this...You WILL NOT be disappointed.I received a digital copy of this album from Sovereign Grace Music in exchange for an honest review.

As a child adopted at birth I was graciously placed in a loving family and never experienced life as an orphan.  As a child (although 26 years old when it happened) adopted into God's family I will never be a spiritual orphan, but rather a loved son.  These two truths alone stir my heart for adoption and have influenced my wife's heart and my heart to seriously consider adoption for any future children.  For these reasons A Passion for the Fatherless by Daniel Bennett was a title that caught my attention.A Passion for the Fatherless accomplishes the task that it sets out by its subtitle  Developing a God-Centered Ministry to Orphans in 3 parts: 1) God and the Orphan 2) God's People and the Orphan 3) Starting an Orphan Care Ministry in Your Church.  Part One: God and the Orphan lays the theological framework for care for orphans.  Many believers will be familiar with James 1:27: Religion that is pure and undefiled before God, the Father, is this: to visit orphans and widows in their affliction, and to keep oneself unstained from the world.  In this one simple verse James places a high calling on care for orphans and widows, a calling that simply cannot be glossed over without thought.  Bennett does a great job of pointing out that Christian orphan care is a unique ministry in that it brings glory to God.  The secular world can, and does, care for many people in our society who are overlooked BUT if they do not acknowledge Jesus Christ as Lord then they are not glorifying God in their ministry.  This is the unique opportunity that only Christian orphan care brings.  God's love for the orphan (us) is clear by the language that he chooses to use (adoption, Abba Father, etc) in regards to our relationship with Him and Christian orphan ministry allows us to mirror that love to those who have a great need for love and care.  Part Two: God's People and the Orphan is where Bennett ties these two thoughts together and shows how God's people should respond to orphans.Part Three: Starting an Orphan Care Ministry in Your Church is the practical application portion where Bennett guides the reader into how to "flesh" orphan care out in the local church.  This section is a great reference tool for church leaders to see a working model for ministry.  In the end orphan care is difficult and costly, but reaches out to those in need with the love of Christ and brings glory to God.  Overall this is a helpful look at the theological and practical side of orphan care and the church.  Definitely a worthwhile book for church leaders to spend some time in.I received a free copy of this book from Kregel Academic in exchange for an honest review.

Worry.  One of those words that certainly carries with it negative feelings.  Sadly, many believers really struggle with worry. We worry about health, we worry about our job, we worry about bills, we worry about our kids and on...and on.. and on.  Many times our thought life in regards to worry doesn't look much different from the world. Even though Philippians 4:8 provides us with a nice list of things to think about instead of worrying, we would rather worry.  The problem with worry is that it reveals doubts in our hearts and minds about the sovereignty of God.  If I truly believe that God is sovereign then my mind should focus on Him instead of worry.Mindscape: What to Think About Instead of Worrying is a new release from Timothy Witmer that provides a practical help to those who struggle with worry.  Mindscape "is not designed to be an academic tome on cognitive or behavioral theory; rather, it is a practical guide for real people with real problems. It is written for everyone who has ever worried about anything!"  This approach makes the book a useful tool for practically anyone as well as for one-to-one or group studies.To stop worrying we must redirect our attention to something or Someone more worthy of our time. "The answer to a transformed mindscape [the landscape of our minds] doesn't come from the outside in but through transformation from the inside out. This transformation occurs as we daily go to Jesus and faith and ask for his power to change, to listen, and to think differently." Ultimately the work to overcome worry is the Spirit's and we must learn to seek Him while we seek to put of worry.Witmer walks through Philippians 4:8 with the reader focusing on what we should think on as opposed to worry.  Each chapter examines a small portion of this text and provides the reader with good thoughts to reorient their thinking to Christ and away from worry. This isn't theologically deep or heavy exposition, but rather, as Witmer states, it is very practical. Each chapter also includes, Food for Thought questions as well as memory verses.  This is a helpful addition to anyone using this in a group setting. Overall, I found the book to be a nice accessibleI received a copy of this book from New Growth Press in exchange for an honest review.

The Christ-Centered Exposition Commentary Series is a new commentary series from Holman Reference edited by David Platt, Daniel Akin and Tony Merida.  The editor's goal is "to present an easy reading, practical and friendly commentary" and "to exalt Jesus from every book of the Bible."  In the introduction the editors lay out four distinguishing characteristics for the series.They are:1) This series seeks to display exegetical accuracy. The desire is to handle God's Word faithfully, even while every volume may not be verse-by-verse commentary.2) The series has busy pastors in view by presenting its material in a readable, pastoral style rather than academic.3) A desire to be known for the "inclusion of helpful illustrations and theological driven applications.4) To exalt Christ in every book of the Bible. They carefully state that, "we are not commending wild allegory or fanciful typology.  We must be constrained to the meaning intended by the divine Author Himself, the Holy Spirit of God.  However, we also believe that the Bible has a Messianic focus, and the authors in this series will exalt Christ from all of their texts."Some of the authors that will contribute to this series that is projected to be 48 volumes are: David Platt, Daniel Akin, Tony Merida, Al Mohler, Eric Mason, Mark Dever, Russ Moore, Matt Chandler, Francis Chan, Thabiti Anyabwile, J.D. Greear and Paige Patterson.  This is a very respectable list of pastors and authors to contribute to this series.Exalting Jesus in James by David Platt will definitely serve as a useful resource for the pastor/teacher or lay-person.  Each section first presents the "Main Idea" of the text.  This is what the author see as the main point that the biblical author is trying to convey in the text.  Next a brief outline is provided to give the reader a visual of the flow of the passage at hand.  After this is the main section, the exposition.  Here Platt provides a very nice clear, concise exposition of the text.  James certainly contains some difficult text, especially when read in isolation and Platt does a good job of keeping the main idea of the passage in mind as he goes.  This isn't a commentary that is going to dig deep into the languages or sentence structure but rather reads much more like a devotional commentary.  Each section ends with questions to help solidify what was just read into the reader's mind.I found Platt's exposition on James 2:14-24 to be quite helpful.  This section is definitely a difficult section of Scripture when it comes to the relationship between faith and works.  Platt quickly points out that "we need to consider how these verses fit with the entirety of Scripture's teaching on faith and works and how these verses radically challenge and change our lives." This is a key point.  Scripture must interpret Scripture and we must look for how this section fits with the Bible as a whole.  Platt is clear as to what direction he is going to take with this section when he says, "The point of the passage is that this person doesn't really have faith. He claims to have it, but he doesn't. His so-called faith is dead and worthless. It does not save; quite literally, it does not work. Understanding this is important because James is not contrasting someone who has immature faith with someone who has mature faith, or someone who has a nominal faith with someone who has authentic faith. He's telling us that you either have faith that saves or you don't there's no in-between.....How do you know if someone has faith that saves? James tells us to look for fruit. Now, he's not saying we need to add deeds to faith in order to be saved. He is saying that deeds are the fruit of faith, and that real, true, genuine faith produces fruit." This is an important point to see.  True faith will work and true believers will bear fruit.Platt's main point in this entire section is that genuine faith results in work.  He gets very pointed at a major issue in American Christianity is a summary statement: Demons believe a lot of things that we believe - they believe in the existence of God, the deity of Christ, and the presence of heaven and hell. They know Christ as the eternal Judge, and they know that Christ alone is able to save. I fear that countless men and women have bought into the soul-damning idea that mere intellectual assent to the truth of God in Christ is enough to save, and the reality is that these people are no better off than the demons themselves.... The demons believe and they "shudder." They are affected by the truth of God; they tremble at it. I wonder how many people define their faith today merely by the emotions they feel at any given time.  These are words that the Church needs to hear, and James focus on works is simply that true faith will result in works.I have now read multiple volumes in this series and each has been a blessing. This is one of the most accessible commentaries that I have come across.  I was blessed by this commentary and found it very helpful and look forward to future volumes in this series.  Overall, excellent work! I received a free copy of this book from B&H Publishing Group (Holman Reference) in exchange for an honest review.

Tracing Christian theology over the course of the last 2000 years is no easy task.  However, this is the task that Gerald Bray decided to take on in his new book God Has Spoken: A History of Christian Theology.  At 1264 pages it is quite clear that Bray has really poured a lot of work into this volume.  The breadth of sources is simply outstanding.  One could spend hours trying track down all the information that is presented in just a single chapter. This really would serve the pastor, teacher or student as a great reference work to have.  This is the type of book that will be helpful anytime the reader wants to have a better grasp on how certain theological topics developed.The book is divided into 8 parts: The Israelite Legacy, The Person of the Father, The Work of the Father, The Person of the Son, The Work of the Son, The Person of the Holy Spirit, The Work of the Holy Spirit, One God in Three Persons. The Trinitarian framework in which Bray presents the material is different than any other historical theology that I've read and was a welcome surprise.Bray draws from so many sources it would simply be impossible to list in this review.  Needless to say, he has done his homework and the end result is a helpful look at the development of theology throughout the history of the church. I would definitely recommend this volume to any serious student of church history.I received a digital copy of this book from Crossway in exchange for an honest review.
I was not very happy with this purchase.  The first time I put the ring on the feather broke off as I was sliding it on.  Not very good craftsmanship.

I bought this shoe because I thought it was exactly like the Christian Louboutin shoes and they almost are. The reason I gave these 4 stars is because the snap on the shoe is not black it is just an unfinished steel snap the pictures shoe the snap black. I did paint the snap black so that my shoe now looks like the Louboutin and I have had many compliments when wearing them. The shoe is well made and is comfortable to wear. The platform and sky high heel are perfect for me giving me a show that I can walk in and have that very high stiletto heel look that I love.

I love this shoe from Onlymaker.  It is very close to a shoe made by Christian Louboutin.  I purchased this in white and the studs are not exactly the same color as the white Louboutin but at $60 as apposed to $1300 I will take it.  The red and black I think are exactly like the Louboutin's but I needed a white shoe.  The shoe is very well made and it looks great.  It is comfortable to wear for a shoe with a 4 3/4 inch heel as long as you do not need to stand for long periods at a time.  I have many pairs of Onlymaker shoes and have been happy with all of them.

I love these shoes.  They look so good and the fit is perfect.  The first time I wore them I was asked Louboutin?  Yes they do look just like the ones made by Christian Louboutin they are much cheaper.  They are well made shoes and will last me a long time which is good because these are my favorite pair of shoes right now.  I have had so many compliments when I wear these shoes how could I not love them.  I have had many pairs of shoes from Onlymaker and very happy with all of them but these are the best so far.  I will continue to buy my name brand knock offs from Onlymaker and keep getting the compliments.

I have a hard time keeping my nails long and looking good. These nails worked great for me for a night out on the town and there were enough nails in the package that I was able to make two sets so I could wear them twice. They are not for long term use though. I found that if you were not real careful washing your hands that you could loose a nail or two. I was very happy with the looks of these nails and they gave me great looking nails on two occasions. They are easy to put on and remove with no nail polish remover required. I will be purchasing more of these nails for future use.

This is a very nice belt for the price.  It fits me with no problems and I wear a size 12/14.  It seems to be well made and has some stretch to it so that it still works for me even after putting on my extra holiday pounds.  I have purchased several other belts from this seller and have been happy with all of the.

I have been getting my Dilbert Calendar for about 5 years now and love it.  As a cube dweller many of his cartoons are right on.  I look forward to reading it every day when I get to work to put a smile on my face and get me ready for a new day of cube dwelling.
I bought this cami as a layering piece in my wardrobe.  It is well made and the length was perfect for my needs.  Since I am using it for layering it is always tucked into my skirt of slacks.

I love this skirt, it looks great.  The skirt is well made and fits me just as I expected.  I knew it was not a real leather panel in the skirt but the faux leather looks good and the price was right.  I had many compliments the first time I wore the skirt so I am real happy with it.

I have ordered other items from this seller and have found that the sizing runs small.  I ordered a size larger than I normally would order and it worked fine for me.  It is well made and is tailored nicely to follow my curves.  I will be ordering this blouse in more colors.

I bought these for winter wear in the upper Midwest where temperatures are well below zero Fahrenheit on some days.  They are well made and look good.  They should work well for a winter option for me.

I love this corset, it can be worn as an undergarment or as a corset top outer garment.  It is well made and fits the way I expected based on their sizing.  My size for this would normally be between a medium or large but according to their sizing I needed an XL so that is what I bought and it did fit perfectly and looked great for the price.  So as long as you follow their sizing you will get a good fitting corset.
I bought this for my husband and he loves it and I have to admit that I love what it does for him.  It has been a fun addition to our bedroom.

$995 for a pair of Valentino Rock Stud sandals or this lookalike for $60.  My shoe budget told me to get this fantastic pair from Onlymaker.  I have purchased many pairs of shoes from Onlymaker so it was an easy choice and again I am very pleased with these shoes.  They fit the way I expected them to fit and they are well made.  The 4 3/4 inch heel is not for the a beginner, if you are not used to walking in high heeled sandals then this is not the shoe for you.  If you are accustomed to high heel sandals you will like the way this shoe fits and it's comfort for a heel of this height.  I bought this shoe in pink and think I will be adding more colors to my shoe collection.

I have purchased Ibici pantyhose in the past so I was familiar with them before I bought these stay ups.  I love the silky feel of these stay ups against my legs.  I ordered these in large because I am tall (5'11") and they fit me perfectly.  They don't bag or sag at the knees and ankles and look great.  These stay ups are also very durable for such a sheer stocking and can be worn for everyday wear.  I bought them in bronze and biscuit and will be adding the black and natural very soon.

I love this shoe, it has everything I love about a sexy looking pump.  It has a sky high stiletto heel and a two inch platform which makes it a shoe that is easy to walk in and comfortable to wear for long periods.  The sizing fits me like I would expect, my true size is a half size when I can find the shoe in a wide size, otherwise I just order the next half size up which I have to do with Onlymaker because they don't have a half-size unless you have your shoe custom made.  I have been very happy with ordering the half size since I am very impatient and don't want to wait the extra time for a custom made shoe.  The shoe is very well made and looks fabulous.  I bought this shoe in blue and thought about buying it in another color but have decided instead to purchase another style of Onlymaker shoe.  This is the 12th pair of shoes I have purchased from Onlymaker and I love every pair.

I love the touch of flare this belt gave to my skirt.  The price was so good I couldn't resist buying this and was very happy I did.  I wanted a chain belt that would ride on my hips and go with my gold pumps and this belt gave me the exact look I was going for.  I have ordered other pieces from Alegra K and at the low prices I am willing to take the risk that it may not be exactly what I wanted but most of the time I am very pleasantly surprised.  I will continue to order from this seller.

I was a little worried when I started reading some of the reviews after I had ordered this.  A couple of people mentioned it was too small and only fit their 9 year old daughters.  I was very happy when I received my choker and put it on, it fit me perfectly and I don't have a petite neck.  I like the way the lace felt against my neck, very soft and not scratchy as I thought it might be.  I was very comfortable wearing this for 6 hours and received many compliment on it.  I will be ordering more items from this seller in the future.

I have a hard time keeping my nails long and looking good. These nails worked great for me for a night out on the town and there were enough nails in the package that I was able to make two sets so I could wear them twice. They are not for long term use though. I found that if you were not real careful washing your hands that you could loose a nail or two. I was very happy with the looks of these nails and they gave me great looking nails on two occasions. They are easy to put on and remove with no nail polish remover required. I will be purchasing more of these nails for future use.

They are not for long term use though.  I found that if you were not real careful washing your hands that you could loose a nail or two. I have purchased several LQ skirts and have been happy with all of them.  This skirt was exactly what I was looking for and is well made and fits me perfectly.  It is comfortable to wear and follows my curves very nicely.  The great price allows me to purchase these skirts in multiple colors which I have been doing.  I have this skirt in Heather Gray, Navy, and Burgundy.  I think Coral Pink or Eggplant my be my next choice.

I love this sexy sandal by Onlymaker. The shoe is well made and it fits as expected. They style of this sandal makes it easy to walk in for a platform sandal with such a high heel. The zipper back makes it a very easy shot to slide my foot into and then zip it up to secure my foot in this sturdy sandal. Well made, great looks, and an affordable price make Onlymaker my favorite shoe designer.

I have been a shoe addict for quite some time now and can't resist a great pair of sexy high heels. I discovered Onlymaker two months ago and this is the tenth pair of shoes I have purchased from Onlymaker. This sexy sandal is well made and fit just the way I expected it too. For a sandal with such a high heel it is not too hard to walk in. I love all of the great choices Onlymaker has and will continue to buy their shoes. I am a shoe addict and Onlymaker is feeding that addiction.

This 2 piece set is quite sexy looking.  It is pretty well made but the sizing was just a little small.  I am still able to wear it but it is a little tight especially around my chest.  The Tap pants were a little smaller than I expected but still overall I am happy with this purchase but if I had to do it over I would have purchased the next larger size up.

I purchased this belt knowing that my waist was a little larger than it says it would fit but for  the price I decided to take the risk.  I am glad I did.  It did stretch enough to fit around my waist very nicely.  My waist is about a 32 and it worked for me and if your waist is any larger than that I wouldn't advise this belt (they say 25 to 28).  The belt seems to be well made and like I pointed out had enough stretch to fit me.

I purchased this belt knowing that my waist was a little larger than it says it would fit but for  the price I decided to take the risk.  I am glad I did.  It did stretch enough to fit around my waist very nicely.  My waist is about a 32 and it worked for me and if your waist is any larger than that I wouldn't advise this belt (they say 25 to 28).  The belt seems to be well made and like I pointed out had enough stretch to fit me.

I have been using this for several months now and couldn't be happier with it.  It comes with the cables I need to charge all of my devices.  I have an IPhone 4 for work, an IPhone 5S for personal use, and an Android Tablet.  This came with all of the cables I needed to charge all of my devices which fit very nicely in the carrying case that came with my Juice Box which means I don't have to worry about having the right cable to charge a device.  I have even used a USB hub to charge all of my devices at one time and it was able to do that.I am an avid cyclist and that also provided my biggest test of the Juice Box.  In July I rode my bike on RAGBRAI which is a week long bike ride across the State of Iowa.  Many rural areas of Iowa are lacking in cell towers and with 15,000 bike riders all with cell phones even when there is a cell tower it is hard to get a connection because of all of the phones trying to connect.  So it ends up being a huge drain on cell phone batteries with your phone always searching for a signal.  Power to charge your phone when you reach your overnight towns is also hard to find since you are competing with 15,000 people also trying to find power.  My Juice Box helped me keep my phone charged up and not having to compete with everyone else for power.  And as an added bonus the built in flashlight helped me to find my way around the campgrounds at night plus giving me the light I needed in my tent.I am very pleased with my Juice Box and would recommend it to everyone looking for a portable power source for your mobile device.

Another great shoe by "The Highest Heel"! This shoe is very well made and is very comfortable to wear, the size fit me exactly like I expected. With a 5 inch heel and 1 inch platform this shoe gives you that very high heel look yet easy to walk in. The rhinestones and gold spikes make this the perfect shoe to wear out clubbing. I got so many compliments wearing this shoe and it was at a price that did not break my budget. I have purchased many shoes made by "The Highest Heel" over the last few years and I think this is one of my favorites.

I have bought several items by Allegra K and know that their sizes run a little small so I ordered a size larger than my normal size and it was not even close.  This was way to small for me, I could not even button it.  This is very cute but the sizing is way off.

I love them!!! I was looking for a pair of leopard print pumps and decided on these and I couldn't be happier. These shoes look great are very well made and fit me exactly as I expected. As a sky high heel lover these shoes are perfect for me. with a two inch platform and a heel that measures over six inches I find them easy to walk in and so comfortable yet they still give me that extreme height I love to wear. these are not the first shoes I have purchased from Onlymaker and they will not be the last. I have been very excited about all of my Onlymaker shoes.

When I ordered this skirt I did not expect it to look like leather.  I have two skirts made by another designer made of the same materiel so I got exactly what I thought I would get.  It is a nice stretch skirt with a sheen to it that I like.  The skirt fits me nicely following my curves in a very flattering way, and exactly what I look for in a pencil skirt.  I am tall and this skirt comes to just below my knees which is the length I wanted.  It seems well made so I should be able to were this for a long time.  I did order this in two colors, pink and mint and am very happy with both of them.I just bought this skirt in Navy so now I have three of them in my wardrobe and happy with all of them.

This is a great dress for the price.  It is not made of the heaviest materiel but it is ok and seems to be made well.  The zipper lets you show as much or as little as you want, be ultra conservative with the zipper all the way down or all the way up and risk getting arrested or anywhere in between.  I bought this dress in pink and beige and am happy with both of them.

This is the first item I have ever purchased from Chaus.  This skirt looks and feels like real leather so for the price it is a fantastic deal.  Not having anything to go by I purchased my regular size and think I would have been better off to go one size smaller but I just wear this skirt a little farther down my hips and it looks good.  The skirt is well made so I am very happy with it and I love the zipper on the side, you can create any length side slit showing a little or lot of leg.  I will not be afraid to purchase another item from Chaus after buying this skirt.

I love these shoes, the picture does not due these shoes justice. They look fantastic. I love the heel height, very high yet not to high to make them difficult to walk in. If you are not used to heels this high these shoes would be great to try. They are well built and fit like I expected. Since I bought my first pair of heels from Onlymaker I have fallen in love with them and now have 5 pairs and getting ready to order another pair. I love the quality and selection I get from Onlymaker.

This is a very sturdy corset but it does run a little small.  I ordered according to the sellers size chart and ended up ordering a size larger than I would normally order and it was still a little small.  I should have ordered two sizes larger than normal.  I am still able to wear it since by adjusting the lacing in the back but the modesty panel does not completely cover the opening in the back.  I am in the process in loosing weight so I am hoping soon that this corset will be the perfect size for me.  I am very happy with the look I do get using this corset.  It gives me a very sexy hourglass figure that I am happy with.

This is a very nice bargain blouse.  The sizes are not US sizes so order according to the seller size chart and not the Amazon sizes.  Oder about 2 sizes larger than you would normally.  I am glad that I did order my blouse according to the sellers chart so I got a blouse that fit me just fine but it was hard to convince myself to order such a large size.  For the price this was a very nice blouse.  The fit was exactly what I expected and I wore it using a belt to give is some shape and got many compliments on the look.  I am considering ordering this in another color.

I bought this to edit my HDR photos.  I purchased a $30 Photomatix plugin for Lightroom and now have the perfect HDR editing tool.  This makes the perfect HDR photos in just minutes.  With the help of a youtube video I was up and running in no time at all.  Lightroom comes with many presets for photo editing and you can find thousands more free presets online that allow you to do amazing things with your photos and it only takes seconds to do this.  I now love to shoot photos on a cloudy day because of the dramatic effects you can get using Lightroom.  Lightroom allows you to do many things that you used to require Photoshop to edit and it makes it so easy to accomplish what used to be a cumbersome task in Photoshop.Easy to learn, easy to use, and excellent results what more do you need out of a photo editing software.

This sleeping bag was exactly what I needed.  The only time I camp is my annual RAGBRAI ride and space is a concern.  For one week we ride our bikes across Iowa and have to get all of our gear for 20 people in our support vehicle each day so smaller is better.  This sleeping bag compressed down to about the size of a quart jar so it was much smaller than a regular sleeping bag so it was perfect for me.  We had a couple of nights that got down in the 50's so it was more than enough to keep me warm.  It is well made and will last me for many rides.

I purchased this pillow to use on my recent trip on RAGBRAI to replace the regular pillow I have used in the past.  I was disappointed in the size of this pillow and after I unfolded it the pillow did not decompress much so I ended up using my regular pillow again.

I love this sandal and it's high stiletto heel. If you are not used to walking in shoes with heel heights over 5 inches this is not the shoe for you. If you are comfortable with heels over 5 inches this may be the sandal for you. This is not the first pair of shoes I purchased with such a heel height, and not even the first pair of sandals with over 5 inch heels I have purchased. That being said I found these shoes easy for me to walk in, this is not a shoe you will try to run in but if you are used to walking in sky high heels you will like these shoes. They are well made and fit me the way I expected them to fit. I love the look of this shoe with the multi color they will go with many things in my closet. I have become a loyal customer of Onlymaker purchasing 4 pairs in the last month and looking at more. I am a shoe addict and Onlymaker has become my shoemaker of choice.

I was amazed at the quality of this bracelet when I opened it.  It looked much nicer than I expected considering the price I paid for this.  This will work for any occasion you need it for and you will get many compliments on it.As an Amazon Prime member this bracelet qualified for free two day shipping.  I ordered it on a Saturday with it scheduled for Tuesday delivery.  I was amazed when it arrived on Monday morning, what great service.

I love these earrings.  These are the longest earrings I have ever purchased and was not sure how they would look.  I have been looking at these for a long time and finally decided the price was right and I bought them.  They looked great on me and I was surprised how light they felt allowing me to wear them for a long time.  I got a lot of compliments on these earrings so I am very happy that I bought them and now I am going to order more of them in different colors.

I wanted something to give me a wild casual look and when I saw these I knew they were exactly what I was looking for.  I was afraid they would be to heavy to wear for any length of time but they were very light and easy to wear for long periods of time.  These are not a high quality dangle that can be worn for work or a formal night but they have a look of being on the wild side for when you want to look free and wild.As an Amazon Prime member these earrings qualified for free two day shipping.  I ordered them on a weekend with a delivery on Tuesday.  They arrived on Monday so that was fantastic service.

This is a quality cable and at a great price.  A quality extension cable that is almost 10 feet long for less than $10 is a deal that I couldn't resist.  I wanted it for my web cam to give me more flexibility in the placement of my cam.  This extension lets me put the web cam almost any place I would ever think of putting it without changing the quality of my video.As an Amazon Prime member this cable qualified for free two day shipping.  My package arrivived on time in perfect condition.

I loved the looks of this top when I saw it and was not dissappointed at all when it arrived.  I read one previous review that stated this fits small so I ordered one size larger than i would normally and it was perfect for me.  It seems to be well made and I can't say enough about the look.  The body of this top is not sheer so you do not need a camis under this and the sheer lace top and sleeves are perfect for a sexy look.  I am tall and was concerned about the sleeves but they have pleny of stretch and covered my arms completely.  At this price I plan on ordering this top in more colors.As an Amazon Prime member this qualified for free two day shipping and my package arrived on time in perfect condition.Update:  I did order this in another color and I am just as happy with the second one as I was with the first.  I think I will order a couple of more of these in the sleeveless style.

This is a very good foundation.  It gives me the coverage I want.  It does have a little bit of sheen so I use a neutral setting powder to take the sheen off and give me the look I want.As an Amazon Prime member this qualified as an add-on so I was able to add this to my order and receive free two day shipping.  My package arrived on time and in perfect condition.

I was looking for a brush set that would not break the bank and decided to try these.  I was very happy with them when they arrived.  I don't need all of these brushes most of the time so did not want to spend a lot of money on brushes so I tried these.  These were a very good quality for what I wanted and work great.  I would be happy to order these again.As an Amazon Prime member these brushes qualified for free two day shipping.  My brushes arrived on time and in perfect condition.

I just bought two of these to replace my old 17 oz Camelbak bottles.  There was nothing wrong with my old bottles I just wanted to the larger bottles to use on my longer rides.  With the larger bottles it is like having an extra bottle with me which is good on long hot rides.  I am an avid Camelbak user because they are the quality products that do a great job.  Since upgrading to Camelbak I have been very happy with how long they keep my drinks cold and my new bottles continue to do a great job for me.As an Amazon Prime member this purchase qualified for free two day shipping and my package arrived on time and in perfect condition.

I ordered this cami as a layering piece to go under a sheer lace blouse that I had purchased.  It worked great for me.  It fit well and seemed to be made pretty well.  It looked great under my lace blouse following my curves perfectly.  I will be ordering more of these in other colors.As an Amazon Prime member this cami qualified for free two day shipping and arrived on time and in perfect shape.

I love to wear stockings rather than pantyhose for special occasions and this garter belt was just what I needed.  It gives a little shaping in the tummy and does a great job of holding my stockings in place with the six garter tabs.  It fits great and feels good wearing it.I am getting ready to order another one of these in white.As an Amazon Prime member this qualified for free two day shipping.  My package arrived on time.Update 6/23/14:  I ordered this in white also so now I have it in black and white and am just as happy with the second one as I was with the first.

When the bag clips first arrived I was really happy with them, they look just like I expected in size, shape and color. They all have a nice wide, secure grip as well. These are much more tight than the clips I have been using so that was another plus for me. Although they have good tension, they are still easy to open, they do not open extremely wide but it’s wide enough to get them on the bags. If I have really thins bags I can even clip two together. These are the strongest bag clips I have ever used, I normally use some form of plastic bag clips but these have been much stronger and I do think they are much more effective at keeping the air out.  I put some to use right away and a set the extras aside. I am going to try something different with the extras. I bought some plain magnets and  I plan to glue them to the backs of my extra clips. My hope is that when they are not in use as bag clips I can use them on the refrigerator. I will update this review once I try that out. Overall I am really happy with the clips and have had no quality issues, they look great, not like dollar store cheapies. I'm really happy!I ordered this set of clips at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I love them.

I ordered this mask at a discount in exchange for my honest review and it has been great. We live in the Midwest and it can get pretty icy cold at times during the winter. My husband and I live on over 4  acres and have a very long driveway. Any time we do trash, get the mail, plow, or walk around the house at all it’s a bit of a distance so we need to bundle up. The mask fits both my husband and I just fine and is very comfortable. Here are my thoughts:ProsSuper thin and light weight, it’s not bulky and in the way so it can fit under a buttoned up coat, you can put a scarf over it and still it’s not too bulkyYou can easily wear a hat along with itIt’s very breathable, I wear glasses so if something is over my nose and mouth they will fog up, this drastically reduces that problem. Most of the time they don’t fog, there may be a breath or too if I am bending over where they fog but it’s not an issue. The vent near the mouth really helps reduce it overall.Super soft and comfortable, I could wear it all day if I had to, it’s not scratchy nor does it cause me any irritationVery easy to put on and offStays in place very well, not a lot of shifting aroundProtects well from wind and coldConsSo far I have not discovered any cons to this, it’s warm, comfortable, and protects me. If I encounter any quality issues I will update this review.Overall this is well constructed, really comfortable and I love how lightweight it is so if I want to layer I can do so without being uncomfortable.

I ordered this vinegar at a discount in exchange for my honest review and it’s great! I normally use balsamic vineger to make salad dressing but recently I decided to cook with it as well. I ended up making a balsamic chicken meal that turned out really good! Either way you go, dressing (for salads or marinades) or cooking as a sauce it tastes great and compares well to my previous brand of balsamic vinegar. My only complaint was that the box and bottle seemed worn/a little dirty, the oil itself was sealed very well so I wasn't too worried but it was a bit of a turn off.  Overall I am happy with the taste!

I ordered this lavender oil at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I really love it. Lavender is one of my favorite scents so I tend to use a lot of the oil around the house. This one works great in my diffusers and I also add a little to my bath every once in a while. This has a valve rather than an actual dropper (I like both for dispensing so I don’t really have a preference). I love that it’s organic since I do put this in my bath every so often. I also put some on a cotton ball and put it in my linen closet. Overall I am really happy with this and haven’t had any problems with it.

When I first ordered this frame I was hoping the photos would not slide out of the frames. I have a similar collage frame that I got several years ago that has this problem. Happily this one holds tight and secure all the photos! The plexiglass is also a great quality, I thought it was actual glass until I came back to Amazon to check the description of it. I'ts clear and smooth and not foggy like some so that also impressed me. The photos are easy to get in and out, I didn't have to pull out my butter knife to get anything in or out. The tabs slide very easily so you can open or close it. I trimmed all my photos to fit the slots I wanted and I have on picture that I haven't printed yet so I just put a solid color craft paper in the slot until I print it, and it looks cute I could leave it that way if I wanted. Overall I am really happy with this.I ordered this at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I have had no issues with it at all.

I recently pulled out my paints to work on a craft project and more than half of them were dried out so it was time for some new! I first checked the craft store but wasn’t really finding what I wanted size and color wise. This set is really perfect for what I wanted. The tubes of paint are a very generous size 75ml and the lids snap closed securely so I don’t think I will have an issue with them drying out as quickly as my others did. It is a nice thick paint that goes on very easily and has great coverage.  I am not a painter but I use paints for general crafting. These paints I used to paint leaves and they provided a nice thick coverage. They also mix well together. I used the white go get other shades of the blues, yellows, and reds and the brown. I have also painted on cardstock paper with these and that works great too. I don’t notice an overwhelming scent to the paint either which is nice. Overall these are just what I wanted, the package says great for beginners and I would agree, I am not an artist and don’t do a lot of painting but these have been great for me, I am really happy with them!I ordered this set of paints at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I ordered this charging cable for my new iphone 5s and it works great. I wanted this short cord so that I could plug it into my laptop and not have a long cord hanging all over the place and this is perfect. I can still pick up the phone and look at it easily but there is not excess getting in my way. I haven’t had any error messages or any other problems using it. Each end fits snug, not too loose, not too tight. I use it all the time and it works just like I would expect it to. Overall it’s what I wanted and I am happy.I ordered this at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I recently bought and iphone 5s so needed some extra charging cables, my husband also has a 5s so we both use them around the house and at our respective computers. Neither of us has had any error messages or issues using the cables. They seem to work just like I would expect them to. they are a soft pliable plastic and each end fits snug when you plug it in, it's not too loose falling out nor is it too tight forcing it in. Overall this is what I needed and I am very happy.I ordered this set of cables at a discount in exchange for my honest review and the are great.

I have long, straight, very fine hair and this mask works great. My hair tends to tangle easily and the ends can become damaged. I have been using and argan oil shampoo recently and have tried masks in the past. I have been really happy with the results so I wanted to try this mask. It compares just as well with the others. It leaves my hair so soft and easy to comb and the effects last for a few days. The mask is white in color and has a bit of a floral scent to it. There's something I like about the scent but also something I'm not liking, I like the floral scent but not sure what the other smell is I'm picking up on. Aside from that I love the mask. It's really easy to apply I just scoop out some on my fingers and work it into my hair, I let it sit and then rinse it very well. It rinses easily but because my hair is so fine I rinse well or it can weigh my hair down a tad. The day of using it my hair combs out so easily. The second day is the same and still feels so soft, I also notice the third day it's still easy to comb. Overall I am very pleased with this hair mask.I ordered this hair mask at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I ordered this fish oil at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I really like it. My doctor directed me to start taking fish oil due to high triglycerides. I have avoided taking fish oil in the past because I have reflux and tend to get a very bad after taste. I was very happy that with these I have very little to no after taste. I do always take them with a meal that really helps. If there is a day that my reflux is really bad I might have a slight after taste but it’s nothing that lasts long nor does it make we want to stop taking it. The pills are large like all fish oils but they are very easy for me to take. My husband also take the fish oil and  he has not after taste at all and he notices memory benefits after taking it. He says he can remember details from meetings at work easier so he wants to continue taking it. He takes them both at the same time but I take on in the morning and then one with dinner.  Overall I am really happy and we will both keep taking the fish oil.

I ordered this conditioner at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I love it! I have recently been trying out Argan oil products on my hair and I really like them so I decided to try out a conditioner. I have long, very fine, straight hair. It tends to damage easily and tangles a lot so I need a conditioner that helps with that. This conditioner has been perfect for me. The conditioner is white in color and I can't pick much of a scent to it so it is truly unscented which is nice for sensitive scalps. The consistency is thick and not runny. It goes on my hair very easily and I let it sit for a few mins before I rinse it out. I was worried that it might be difficult to rinse out but it rinses very easily, I was impressed. My hair is smooth and much easier to brush out after the shower. My hair is very long so it can be a challenge to do both those things, rinse well and then comb out while it is wet. Since my hair is so fine another challenge is finding a conditioner that doesn't weigh it down or leave it looking greasy and this one does not. My only complaint would be the bottle it comes in, I just wish it was a bit more pliable so it can be easily squeezed. This isn't too much of an issue but it would make the whole package. Overall I am very happy with this and will continue to use it.

I recently ran out of my facial serum so wanted to try this. I have combination skin and I also tend to have clogged pores. My facial skin is not overly sensitive like some people but it can be sensitive. This serum does have some bite, when I first put it on there is a bit of a sting, it’s not enough to bother me and it goes away pretty quickly but there is a bit of a bite to it. It comes in a pump and I need about a half of a pump to cover my face and neck, a little goes a long way. It has a white color and the consistency is thick like a facial lotion, not watery like some serums. I am neutral on the scent of this, there is something in it that smells really good and there is something in it that I don’t care for, a strong chemical type smell. I tried shaking it up a bit to see if that would help. I wonder if it is a fluke because other reviewers seem to like the scent. It’s not enough to make me dislike the serum altogether but it’s not my favorite scent. I can't find an expiration date anywhere on the bottle or packaging either. So far my skin has an overall brighter look to it (just not so dull) so I am happy with that. I will continue to use this and update the review with any other results I have from using it. Overall I like what I am seeing so far I’m just not a huge fan of the scent.I ordered this serum for free in exchange for my honest review.

I ordered this set of lights at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I really love them. They are a very bright purple (they are even very bright during the day!) The battery pack makes it very easy to decorate where I want to. I am mixing the purple, pink, and blue colors for what I want to decorate and it looks really pretty. The battery pack is clear plastic so you can see the batteries in it, which isn't a big deal because I hide the pack behind something. The lights are easy to work with and don't tangle up on me while I'm setting them up. They also don't get hot which is better than my usual Christmas lights. I also plan to use these for my daughter's birthday party because they are so bright during the day they will still look great for her party. Overall I am really happy with these and haven't had any quality issues.

I ordered this set of lights at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I really love them. I wanted some battery sets like this so I could be more flexible with how I decorate and these are perfect. I can hide the battery pack behind some other decor and spread my lights out how I like. The battery pack is a clear plastic and you can see the batteries inside of it so I like to hide it. These light are extremely bright. Even during the day they are very bright. They are easy to work with as well they don't tangle up like my traditional lights do. Overall I am really happy with the lights, they are a good quality, they don't get hot, they are super bright, and I can put them anywhere because I don't have to plug them in.

I ordered this slope bag at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I really love it. I ordered the “Feather” pattern and it’s really vibrant and unique. The bag is very well made and a great quality. I use this as a stand in for my diaper bag if I am going some place like the zoo for the day. I also use it when taking my little on to her swim lessons so I can carry just what I need for the short lesson. It has plenty of room for a few diapers, her snack cup, large toddler sippy cup, diaper wipes, a change of clothes, and my camera. That is what I typically carry it in but there is room for more if need be. There is also a small zipper pocket in the front that’s really convenient for a cell phone, money, and keys. There is a second, larger, front pocket that I use to keep the zoo map in but it could hold much more than that (that pocket also has a keychain clip but we use it for a small anitbac bottle).The interior of the bag is waterproof (mine is a hot pink color too!) which is great because my little one’s cup leaked out the other day but it didn’t soak the whole bag I was able to just wipe it out and it was dry. The interior also has two main zipper pockets that are about the same size, one onside I keep diaper items and the other I put food items. One of them has a small interior zippered pocket that you could also use for keys and cell phone but we keep a small sunscreen and chap stick in this pocket. The second large main pocket has a Velcro pocket that is designed to hold a 7 inch tablet.Overall I really love how much this holds and how versatile it is. The bag itself is lightweight which is really important for me because I have back problems. Just holding her empty diaper bag it is much heavier than the empty slope bag and that really makes a difference when you are carrying this for hours at the zoo or park. The strap is very tick and sturdy and it’s very easy to adjust. The buckle that’s on the adjustable strap is also very sturdy and an excellent quality.

I ordered this selfie stick at a discount in exchange for my honest review and it has been great! This is the best style selfie stick for me because all you do is plug it into your phone rather than hook up with blue tooth.It works perfect with my iphone 5s and 4s. When I first got this it took me less than one minute to get it out of the box, put my phone on and take a picture. Directions are included if you haven't used one before but it's so simple to use. The telescopic arm is nice and sturdy and it doesn't swivel around like some I have used. This holds my phone tightly and keeps it steady. You can get a lot more people in a selfie groups shot with this! Plus you get more of your scenic background. I haven't had any issues with this one and I really like it!

I ordered this set of earphones at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I have to say I didn't expect to care for them because they look just like what came with my iphone. I wanted to give it a try to see if they would be any more comfortable and they are! The set that came with my iphone for some reason starts to hurt after about a half an hour. This set looks almost just like them but the comfort lasts! I use them to listen to movies after my little one goes to bed. My husband and I watch on our lap top and use earphones so we don't wake her. I can get through an entire movie and these are still comfortable. They also have a great sound. So far I have had no quality issues with them and I'm really happy with the sound and comfort.

I ordered this pedometer at a discount in exchange for my honest review and it has been great. Here are my thoughts:ProsSmall and light weightVery accurate in counting my steps – I used this right out of the box and my steps were accurate I didn’t  have to calibrate my stride or anything so that was very nice!It’s simple, there is not much to it – the display shows you the total steps taken, distance walked, and an estimate of calories burned based on those two things the display shows only one of those at a time so to see the other info you just press the mode button and it will show you the nextMotivates me to be more active during the day – this really shows you how sedentary you can be in the course of the day an reminds me to get movingIt has a rounded shape unlike my last unit, so it’s not snagging on clothingHas an auto shut off mode so if you are inactive for 4 mins it will go to sleep so it’s a nice battery saver, once you move it wakes up and starts counting againConsIn order to see the three different modes you have to press the “mode” button, which is fine but it’s located on the back of the unit so you have to take it off or if you are wearing loose pants you can kinda twist it to the side but you will need to remember which one is the mode button because it’s right next to the “set:” buttonSame thing with the “reset” button it’s on the back so you either have to take it off or try and twist it to the side to press it.The display has a concaved look to it so it can be a bit difficult to read and it’s not back lit so you can’t read it in the darkThe clip is not they type you pinch to open, it just slides down onto the waist band but it’s not much room so if you have on a thick waist band this will be really tightThe pedometer is very accurate in counting my steps but it can pick up extra movements to so it may show a slightly higher number of steps than what you actual too over the course of a full day. To me this isn’t that big of a deal but maybe to some people if they are tracking distance.Overall I love how simple this unit is, if you want something to simply keep track of your steps than this works great. It has a few downsides but in spite of them I still use this just fine and I find it to be very motivating which to me is more important.

I ordered this set of solar lights at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I really love them! They are an excellent quality and they have been working great for me. They are very easy to set up and I didn't have any issues with them tangling. The color of the lights leans more towards yellow than white, it's a very warm white color that's more yellow vs the blueish type of white. It has rained a lot since they have been out and that hasn't been an issue. The one down side is they may not last the entire night. Some days they do and other days they don't. Even if they get sun all day long they sometimes aren't on til dusk like my other sets are. Other than that I am really happy with these, They give off a warm color and they look great. If I do have any other issues I will update this review.

I ordered this tea at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I love it. Earl Grey is probably my favorite tea and this one is fantastic. The tea is very fresh and smells wonderful. It has a perfect Earl Grey flavor. The bag it comes in is resealable which is convenient. It also indicates the month and year the tea was picked. When I make mine I follow the instructions and use one teaspoon of the tea. I let mine steep for about 5 mins. It's perfect without a sweetener but I sometimes add honey. Overall I don't have one complaint about this tea, I drink it every day and I love it. I don't think you will be disappointed with this and I have no problems recommending it to potential buyers.

The 9X13 baking dish is one of my most use baking dishes so I decided I needed a second one. At times I have more than one dish I’d like to make in this size but have to split it up so having a second has been very handy (plus I feel better knowing that this one is shatterproof!). The dish is very sturdy and thick but it’s not extremely heavy.I generally make veggie dishes or breakfast bake dishes in this and it works great. This baking dish is a little more shallow than my other (but not by much) so if I have a large meal like lots of chicken and pasta I use the deeper dish. It’s easy to clean up, I either hand wash or it also fits in my dishwasher.I love that the care instructions are etched on the bottom. I can never remember which of my items are oven safe or stove top safe or so on. I have a few that are versatile but I forget which ones because they don’t indicate it any place. I also love that I can put this in the freezer for my make ahead meals. After it arrived I noticed that it is made in the USA so that was another bonus for me. Overall I am really happy with this and have had no quality issues!I ordered this dish at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I needed this size pan to replace an old one of mine and I am really happy with this one. My old one was similar but I have lost track of it after a few moves. This pan is very sturdy and feels thick to me. It’s not overly heavy but it does have some weight to it. I am no expert pie maker but this bakes just fine for me. I use it more for pot pies than I do for dessert pies.The dish is nice and deep (a bit deeper than my old one) so you can really stuff it full if you want to! I love that this can go in the freezer as well, I have started to do more and more make ahead type meals.It’s very easy to wash, I have hand washed it and put it in the dishwasher with no issues. Another thing I really like is that the care instructions are  etched into the bottom of the dish so there is no guessing whether or not it can be used on the stove top or whatnot.Overall I am really happy with this, it’s a nice sturdy heavy dish that also has the fluted edging so you can create a nice designed edge if you wish, and it is a shatterproof plate, so it’s everything I need.I ordered this pan at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I received this book as a Christmas gift several years ago and I keep trying to work with it but I just can't get it. The book has nice photographs but they don't show enough for a beginner like myself. The written directions are just not enough on most of these instructions, whether it be casting on or the actual stitch. I was able to make one project (the fish pillow) and it turned out really cute. I have not been able to make a simple scarf though. I have made a scarf using the instructions that came with my loom set. Maybe this book just isn't for me and others will get the hang of it. I am a clueless beginner and I need more than what's in here in order to complete anything else. I was also a bit let down by the include projects. There are only a handful that I would use, but that is more of a personal preference. If you are already pretty familiar with the loom and the terms used this may be good for you. I am a crocheter and I can't knit with knitting needles. I know that after crocheting for 30 years I can figure our a poorly written pattern by using my experience. To get me started on the loom I need more help than this.

I ordered this face mask at a discount in exchange for my honest review and it works great! I have combination skin and large pores that tend to clog on a regular basis. My absolute favorite part is the scent but here are my other thoughts:ProsThe consistency is so nice, it’s so easy to applyA little goes a long wayHelps control my oilDoesn’t cause me any irritation or rednessSmells amazing and is a soothing experienceDoesn’t leave my skin feeling dried outConsI haven’t had any negative experiences with this other than I haven’t had noticeable results with it helping clogged poresThere is no safety/freshness seal on thisOverall I am really happy with this and will continue to use it. If over time this does improve my pores I will update this review.

This set of marbles is just as you would expect them to be. They are glass and mine are various colors. Most of my colors are darker shades, like orange, brown, black and swirls of dark colors. We wanted these for our marble run and they work great for that. They are the smaller sized marbles so you’ll want to check your marble run if that’s what you are using them for. Overall they are a great quality and consistent in size and shape and I am happy with them!I ordered this set of marbles at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I ordered this lavender oil to use in my oil diffuser and it has been great. I love that it comes with a glass dropper and a traditional lid for long term storage. I mostly use this in the diffuser but I have also used it in my bath and I also love to put some on a cotton ball and then put that in my pajama drawer so my pj's smells nice! My next idea was to mix up a spray for my bed sheets and I think it will work just as well.I have used several different types of lavender but only one other Bulgarian, it smells great (to me it's different than my other lavenders) and comes packaged in amber glass. The consistency is a bit thicker than other oils I use but for what I am doing it doesn't really matter. Overall I am happy with this and will continue to use it!I ordered this oil at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I ordered these chia seeds at a discount in exchange for my honest review and they are great. The seeds are sealed in a bag and they were very fresh when they arrived. the bag is resealable which is nice for storage. I mostly use these seeds when making overnight oatmeal and green smoothies but I'd like to start adding it to more foods.If you have never tried adding them to foods they really don't have much of a flavor you really just get the benefits from them, which is nice for the picky eaters. They are just as good as the kind I buy at my local grocery store. I haven't had any issues with this brand and I will continue to use it!

I ordered this set of lights at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I really love them. They create such a nice atmosphere in or outdoors but I mostly had them outdoors (I have put them away for the winter because we won't be using the patio). Here are my other thoughts:ProsVery bright warm glow, they are even bright in the daylight which I likeEasy to put up and down, each light has a clip so you have a few options on how you can hang theseBulbs seem really sturdyThey aren't overly heavyConsThe lights get really warm, I'd watch them carefully if using indoorsThe lights go almost all the way to the plug on the cord which could be a con depending upon how you are hanging them, when I had them inside several of the lights were hidden behind furniture so you loose some in a sense. This wasn't really a big enough deal for me to knock off a star thoughOverall I am really happy with this set of lights and it's exactly what I wanted. If I have any quality issues with them I will update this review.

I ordered this cell phone holder at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I really love it. I use this with my iphone 5s and it fits perfectly. I wanted to try this holder because it seems so versatile and it truly has been. The only down side to some of the positions in which it can be used is that it tends to bounce a little if you were to touch it at all. So far this really hasn't been an issue for me but it's good to know. The goodneck bends and curls pretty much however you want it, you just need to make sure your phone will be balanced in that position. It also comes with a clip that you can attach and then clip it to the edge of a table or whatnot. Overall I really love how versatile this is and I will continue to use it. I haven't had any quality issues with it and it holds my phone very securely.

I ordered this cable at a discount in exchange for my honest review and it works perfectly. It's a great quality that is very sturdy on each end. We use it for our XBox and it works just fine! The ports fit properly they are snug and won't fall out easily. Overall it's a better quality than our other hdmi cable so we are confident it will last us a long time. If I do have any quality issue with this I will be sure to update the review.

I ordered this decorative sign at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I  love it! The plaque looks great and I have no quality issues with it. It’s made of a wood composite material so it’s not a hollow cheap plastic. The design is printed on and mine is perfect with no printing flaws. It’s made to look worn with a vintage feel (this is also part of the print design it’s not actually distressed wood). The back has slots for nails/screws to hang this and I love that they are already level/even for me. Right now I have mine propped on a book shelf because I like how it looks there but if I do decide to hang it that feature will be helpful. Overall I am really happy with this and if I wasn’t keeping it for myself it would make a great gift!

I ordered this fish oil at a discount in exchange for my honest review and it has been great. I was directed by my doctor to take fish oil on a daily basis, the directions say to take one or two per day and I usually take two (one in the morning and one with dinner). I have acid reflux so some fish oils can have a horrible aftertaste but this one has been really good. Every so often I might notice a slight aftertaste but it's nothing horrible. When I first tried fish oil I was worried I wouldn't be able to deal with the aftertaste but this fish oil has made it possible for me to take it. My husband doesn't have reflux and he takes it as well, he has never noticed any aftertaste (he takes it twice per day). My husband started taking this only because I did but he has noticed an improvement in his ability to recall details better. If he has a busy day at work he says he can still recall notes from meetings he's been in, where before he would have to go back and look it up. So he's very happy. I was directed to take them for my triglycerides so I won't know until my next physical if the oil has helped. I will update the review once I do. Overall we are happy with this, they don't have much odor, they are large but easy to swallow, and there's almost no aftertaste.

I ordered this bag at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I really like it so far. Our trip is not planned until this winter but I have been using the bag to store my infant car seat, it is a Chicco Key Fit 30 and it works great for that. It protects it for dirt and dust, I store it so the drawstring closure is on the side because I don't want dust to fall into that opening.
